title: Worms Armageddon 3.7.2.1 [no-Steam]
description:
-------------------------------
                |    Worms Armageddon 3.7.2.1   |
                 -------------------------------


General info:
------------

Genre: Strategy.
Developer: Team 17.
Year: 1999.



Minimum requirements:
--------------------

OS: Windows XP or above
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD 64x2 or above
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8600GT (256MB), AMD/ATI Radeon HD3650 (256MB), Intel HD3000 or above
DirectX: 9.0
Hard Drive: 2 GB HD space
Sound: DirectX 9 compliant sound card or above



About the game:
--------------

The best Worms ever.

 - Use over 55 weird and wonderful weapons and tools including Earthquake, Freeze and French Sheep Strike.
 - Play single-player Deathmatch plus an exciting 40+ mission campaign.
 - Learn tactics using five special training modes including Sheep Racing, Crazy Crates and Advanced Weapon Training.
 - Over 30 custom and comedy sound banks (including stiff upper lip, Cyberworms and more).
 - New for multi-player mode: Handicapping (add or deduct energy for a team), Allied Teams (team up with others to target another player), Ã¢â‚¬ËœWorms DiseaseÃ¢â‚¬â„¢, Home Runs and many, many more.



About this release:
------------------

- The game is updated to version 3.7.2.1 and nothing has been deleted.
- Neither Steam nor the original CD are needed. Just install and play.
- Multiplayer works both internet (Wormnet) and L.A.N.
- Under Windows 8 and 10 perhaps you won't be able to see any shortcut but the one placed at the desktop. Never mind: to run the game just double-click on "WA.exe".
- The files have been taken from the CD version of the game. This means the content ripped in Steam version has not been removed here.

Q: Does the multiplayer work?
A: Yes, it does.

Q: Do I need Steam to play?
A: No, you do not.

Q: Do I need the original CD to play?
A: No, you do not.

Q: Does it work under Windows 10?
A: Yes, it does. 

 

Notice this is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation
